scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a celestial gathering with six winged figures. In the upper register, three figures with large, feathered wings and halos are arranged in a triangular formation. Below them, in the lower register, three smaller winged figures, appearing as children, hold hands and form a semi-circle. The background is a dark, stylized pattern of foliage, suggesting a heavenly or otherworldly setting. The figures are rendered in pale tones with delicate detailing on their wings and garments.
